column5: How come all of the topics only show the first post as of now, and you have to load again to view next posts? Just saying, but can we have the old style of forum from before? My internet is kinda slow, and would suck to load each and every time to view a single reply. Thanks
When you have this thread open, click on "options" in the top right corner of the post.  Click on "standard" and all should be ok. You are likely on "outline".
This always seems to happen when you follow a link here from google
